import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useLogin } from '../hooks/useLogIn' const AdminLogIn = () => { const [email, setEmail] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState('') const { login, error, isLoading } = useLogin() const navigate = useNavigate(); const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault() await login(email, password) navigate('/admin/manager') } return (

Adminstator Sign In

{ setEmail(e.target.value) }} value={email} type="email" className="form-control mt-1" placeholder="Enter email" />
{ setPassword(e.target.value) }} value={password} type="password" className="form-control mt-1" placeholder="Enter password" />
{error &&
{error}
}
) } export default AdminLogIn
